zoomInstruction: Right click + drag, or Mouse wheel scroll
rotateInstruction: Middle click + drag, or Ctrl + Left/Right click + drag
projectInfoText: The developed system was submitted as part of the master's thesis to the Institute of Cartography and Photogrammetry and the Chair of Geoinformation of the Faculty of Geodesy, University of Zagreb, in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the academic degree of Master of Science in Geodesy and Geoinformatics (univ. mag. ing. geod. et geoinf.).
author: Author
